# ASP.NET Core
## Ignore build outputs
bin/
obj/

# Visual Studio
.vscode/
.vs/
.vscode/
.vscode/*

# User-specific files
*.rsuser
*.suo
*.user
*.userosscache
*.sln.docstates

# Auto-generated files
*.log
*.tlog
*.idb
*.pdb
*.ipch
*.aps
*.ncb
*.pch

# Visual Studio Code
.vscode/

# ASP.NET Scaffolding
ScaffoldingReadMe.txt

# Node
node_modules/

# JetBrains Rider
.idea/
.idea/*

# Logs
logs/
*.log

# Environment variables
.env

# Publish output
publish/

# Npm package
*.tgz

# Yarn Integrity file
.yarn-integrity

# DotNet
*.swp
*.lock.json

# Mono Auto Generated Files
mono_crash.*

# Backup & report files from converting an old project file to a newer
# Visual Studio version. Backup files are not needed, because we have git ;-)
*.old
*.orig

# Windows image file caches
Thumbs.db
ehthumbs.db

# Folder config file
Desktop.ini

# Recycle Bin used on file shares
$RECYCLE.BIN/

# Windows Installer files
*.cab
*.msi
*.msm
*.msp

# Windows shortcuts
*.lnk

# Exclude all files that are binaries and intermediate files for compiling
*.exe
*.dll
*.so
*.dylib
*.lib
*.a
*.pdb
*.ilk
*.obj
*.o
*.cmd

# Temporary files
tmp/
temp/

# Rider project files
.idea/

# Rider specific content
.idea_modules/
.idea/assetManagement/
.idea/codeStyles/
.idea/codescan-problems/
.idea/content/
.idea/dictionaries/
.idea/fileTemplates/
.idea/find/FindInProject.xml
.idea/inspectionProfiles/Default.xml
.idea/inspectionProfiles/Profiles.xml
.idea/libraries/
.idea/misc.xml
.idea/modules.xml
.idea/name.scopes/
.idea/runConfigurations/
.idea/vcs.xml
.idea/workspace.xml
.idea/tasks.xml

# SQL Server database files
*.mdf
*.ldf

# Excel binary workbook
*.xlsb

# JetBrains Rider
.idea/

# End of https://www.toptal.com/developers/gitignore/api/visualstudio
